title: Part One:  Mark Zuckerberg Should Be On Trial For Crimes Against Humanity
itunes:title: Part One:  Mark Zuckerberg Should Be On Trial For Crimes Against Humanity
description:
Robert is joined by Jamie Loftus for an update on the crimes of Mark Zuckerberg.


  1. https://www.nbcnews.com/tech/tech-news/qanon-groups-have-millions-members-facebook-documents-show-n1236317 
  2. https://archive.is/rCvAy#selection-1323.0-1327.269
  3. https://www.buzzfeednews.com/article/craigsilverman/facebook-ignore-political-manipulation-whistleblower-memo 
  4. https://www.buzzfeednews.com/article/ryanmac/facebook-failed-kenosha?bfsource=relatedmanual
  5. https://www.buzzfeednews.com/article/ryanmac/facebook-employee-leaks-show-they-feel-betrayed
  6. https://www.buzzfeednews.com/article/craigsilverman/facebook-zuckerberg-what-if-trump-disputes-election-results?bfsource=relatedmanual 
  7. https://www.instagram.com/p/CAQ6NpFA-au/?utm_source=ig_embed 
  8. https://www.businessinsider.com/mark-zuckerberg-haircut-explained-augustus-caesar-2019
  9. https://www.newyorker.com/magazine/2018/09/17/can-mark-zuckerberg-fix-facebook-before-it-breaks-democracy 
  10. https://www.theguardian.com/commentisfree/2018/sep/12/what-attracts-mark-zuckerberg-roman-hardman-augustus 
  11. https://time.com/5880118/myanmar-rohingya-genocide-facebook-gambia/ 
  12. https://www.vice.com/en_us/article/xg897a/hate-speech-on-facebook-is-pushing-ethiopia-dangerously-close-to-a-genocide 
  13. https://www.amazon.com/dp/B007MAXH38/ref=dp-kindle-redirect?_encoding=UTF8&btkr=1
